name: Hindsight
headline: Win-Loss Analysis for GTM Teams
description:
The best athletes deeply study their game tape to improve.
Sales teams can't because 85% of the closed-lost reasons they track are incorrect.

Hindsight helps teams collect objective, unbiased insights from their deal teams and buyers when opportunities move to closed-won, closed-lost, or churned. This allows teams to learn from each deal that comes through the pipeline and measurably improve win rates. 

Learn more at: https://www.usehindsight.com/
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; industry:ai-assistant; location:new-york

founders.name: Ani Gottiparthy, Founder

generated_description:
**Hindsight: Elevating Win-Loss Analysis for Sales Teams**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from New York, Hindsight is on a mission to revolutionize how sales teams approach win-loss analysis using AI. Now part of Y Combinator's W23 cohort, this startup tackles a critical issue: 85% of reasons for closed-loss opportunities tracked in CRMs are inaccurate or incomplete. It’s no surprise that organizations relying on flawed data repeat mistakes, inadvertently leaving substantial revenue on the table.

Think about the best athletes who analyze their game tapes obsessively to learn from every play. Hindsight functions as a similar coach for sales teams, allowing them to collect objective insights from both deal teams and buyers at pivotal stages—when deals are won, lost, or churned. This innovative approach helps teams learn from their experiences, fine-tune their strategies, and measurably enhance their win rates.

With a tight-knit team of three and led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, Hindsight provides a comprehensive suite of functionalities focused around AI-powered insights. Their offerings include:

1. **AI Deal Reviews** – Seamlessly integrate with HubSpot or Salesforce to pull in deals and assess key decision-making drivers.
2. **AI Win-Loss Interviews** – Conduct feedback surveys and live interviews with prospects, using context-aware AI to ensure relevant questions are asked each time.
3. **AI Competitive Research** – Automate research tasks such as gathering competitor reviews or monitoring community sentiment through an AI assistant.

They promise not just better data but also faster learning—helping teams identify mistakes and uncover new opportunities, with potential win rate increases of up to 15%.

The company is firmly rooted in the B2B sales enablement landscape, armed with a robust understanding of buyer priorities and competitive dynamics. Hindsight's tools aim to uncover actionable insights that lead to improved product roadmaps, sales processes, and competitive positioning.

In short, if you want to learn from your sales efforts effectively, Hindsight offers the means to do that without relying on guesswork or outdated data.   

For more insights and to get started with their solutions, check out their website: [Hindsight](https://www.usehindsight.com/).
